SILENT.Name: SILENT
SILENT.Description: If SILENT=1, it will not display any compiling messsage

PFLOAT.Name: PFLOAT
PFLOAT.Description: If FLOAT=1, it will enable float point print when using nano newlib

NEWLIB.Name: NEWLIB
NEWLIB.Description: If NEWLIB=nano, it will use nano newlib, otherwise it will use normal newlib

NOGC.Name: NOGC
NOGC.Description: If NOGC=1, it will not gc any sections during compiling to save code size

VERBOSE.Name: VERBOSE
VERBOSE.Description: If VERBOSE=1, it will display compiling message in verbose including compiling options
